VERSION.details: Should be incremented when contract changed

deployRouter(address).notice: Deploy {PawnShopRouter} for the given {user}. Any user is allowed to have only one instance of deployed router. Address of the deployed router can be taken through {deployedRouter}

router(address).notice: Deployed instances of PawnShopRouter for the given users

userdoc.notice: Factory to deploy personal instances of PawnShopRouter
